20101202233439.571|20101202233441.000|CCO|AIRPORT ON THE WAY BACK TO L.A.

20101202233445.000|20101202233447.000|CCO|SHE HAD BREAST MILK IN

20101202233449.000|20101202233451.000|CCO|SHE DIDN'T WANT TO PUT THE MILK

20101202233456.000|20101202233457.667|CCO|CAN BE PASSED THROUGH SECURITY

20101202233619.571|20101202233621.000|CCO|AND HE LOOKED ME SQUARE IN THE

20101202235432.667|20101202235434.333|CCO| 7 OUT OF 10 STELARA PATIENTS
20101202235434.333|20101202235436.000|CCO| SAW AT LEAST 75% CLEARER SKIN
20101202235436.000|20101202235437.667|CCO|          AT 12 WEEKS.
20101202235437.667|20101202235439.333|CCO|  AND 6 OUT OF 10 PATIENTS HAD
20101202235439.333|20101202235441.000|CCO|  THEIR PLAQUE PSORIASIS RATED
20101202235441.000|20101202235442.111|CCO|     AS CLEARED OR MINIMAL
20101202235442.111|20101202235443.222|CCO|          AT 12 WEEKS.
20101202235443.222|20101202235444.333|CCO|STELARA MAY LOWER YOUR ABILITY
20101202235444.333|20101202235445.444|CCO|      TO FIGHT INFECTIONS
20101202235445.444|20101202235446.556|CCO|          AND INCREASE
20101202235446.556|20101202235447.667|CCO|    YOUR RISK OF INFECTIONS.
20101202235447.667|20101202235448.778|CCO|    SOME SERIOUS INFECTIONS
20101202235448.778|20101202235449.889|CCO|    REQUIRE HOSPITALIZATION.
20101202235449.889|20101202235451.000|CCO|   BEFORE STARTING STELARA,
20101202235451.000|20101202235452.111|CCO|    YOUR DOCTOR SHOULD TEST
20101202235452.111|20101202235453.222|CCO|       FOR TUBERCULOSIS.
20101202235453.222|20101202235454.333|CCO|     STELARA MAY INCREASE
20101202235454.333|20101202235455.444|CCO|     YOUR RISK OF CANCER.
20101202235455.444|20101202235456.556|CCO|   ALWAYS TELL YOUR DOCTOR IF
20101202235456.556|20101202235457.667|CCO|YOU HAVE ANY SIGN OF INFECTION,

20101202235458.778|20101202235459.889|CCO|       ALERT YOUR DOCTOR
20101202235459.889|20101202235501.000|CCO|  OF NEW OR WORSENING PROBLEMS
20101202235501.000|20101202235502.250|CCO| INCLUDING HEADACHES, SEIZURES,

20101202235508.500|20101202235509.750|CCO|   SERIOUS ALLERGIC REACTIONS
